price: I zbog nevjerovanja njihovoga i zbog iznošenja teške klevete protiv Merjeme.
arabic: وَبِكُفۡرِهِمۡ وَقَوۡلِهِمۡ عَلَىٰ مَرۡيَمَ بُهۡتَٰنًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wabikuf'rihim waqawlihim ʿalā maryama buh'tānan ʿaẓīman
